title: Happy New Year, Kogoro Mouri (TV Special)

infobox.Title:: Fugitive: Kogoro Mouri  Happy New Year, Kogoro Mouri (New Year Greeting)
infobox.Japanese Title:: 逃亡者・毛利小五郎  (Tōbōsha Mōri Kogorō)  謹賀新年 毛利小五郎  (Kingashin'nen Mōri Kogorō) (New Year Greeting)
infobox.Cast:: Kogoro Mouri  Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Eri Kisaki  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Hiroshi Agasa  Azusa Enomoto  Yoko Okino  Masumi Sera  Heiji Hattori  Kazuha Toyama  Kamen Yaiba  Gomera  Koshi Anno  Aina
infobox.Next Conan's Hint:: N/A  The first seven days of the year (New Year Greeting)
infobox.Animation Director:: Masatomo Sudo (New Year Greeting chief)  Kenichi Otomo  Nobuyuki Iwai (co-op)  Miharu Nagano (co-op)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Gara Takashima as Eri Kisaki  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Mikiko Enomoto as Azusa Enomoto  Kyōsei Tsukui as Koshi Anno  Takahiro Miyake as Man  Sayuri Hara as Announcement

sections.Situation: Kogoro says he's being chased by someone. He tells Azusa to not tell anybody where he is but her mouth slip and the chase begins. He thinks of ways he can get away from these people who are after him.
sections.People:
- Horserace stadium employee
- Nichiuri TV announcer
sections.Trivia:
- This episode is a commemorative work to celebrate the release of Dimensional Sniper on theatres.
- This episode was later broadcasted under the name Happy New Year, Kogoro Mouri on TV in January 3, 2015. New year related content was added, along with New Year Greetings featuring Heiji and Kazuha appearance.
